entry.title: Fastest-possible PoW via Simple DAG
entry.summary: The correspondence inquires about the availability of an upcoming paper related to a theoretical result discussed earlier. The sender expresses interest in the theory, noting its intrigue despite acknowledging that it may not have immediate implications for mainnet deployment in the near future. The inquiry highlights a curiosity for deeper understanding and documentation of the research findings, suggesting an eagerness to explore the subject matter further. The mention of the theoretical result implies it holds significance or novelty, warranting further investigation and documentation through scholarly work. This interaction underscores the ongoing dialogue and exchange of ideas within the programming and research community, where theoretical advancements are valued even when their practical application might not be immediately forthcoming.
